SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
A simple demo application that reads some data from a FreeSurfer subject directory and writes out some vertex-colored meshes in PLY format.
Colormap
An interface to a colormap, i.e., a mapping from a numerical value to a color.
FsAnnot
Represents a FreeSurfer annotation file.
FsAnnot.AnnotFileFormat
Enum for the different annotation file formats.
FsColortable
A FreeSurfer colortable, as used in the annotation files.
FsCurv
Class representing a FreeSurfer curv file, or a CSV file with per-vertex data for a surface (mesh)
FsLabel
Models a FreeSurfer label, can be a surface label or a volume label.
FsMgh
Models a FreeSurfer volume.
FsMgh.VolumeFileType
Enum for the different volume file types.
FsMghData
Models a FreeSurfer label, can be a surface label or a volume label.
FsMghHeader
Models a FreeSurfer label, can be a surface label or a volume label.
FsSurface
Represents a FreeSurfer surface, i.e.
IMesh
Models a triangular mesh, i.e.
IO
Utility class for reading and writing files, handling gzip compression and byte order.
Mesh
Class representing a 3D mesh, with vertices and faces.
Mesh.MeshFileFormat
Enumeration of supported mesh file formats.
Mesh.PlyHeaderInfo
Models the header information from an ASCII PLY file.
Mz3
Class representing a MZ3 surface file.
Utilities
Utility functions.
Viridis
A sequential colormap using the colors from the Viridis colormap from matplotlib.
